{"id":1025844718,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1692458139,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"29 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1025844718/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make String a Subsequence Using Cyclic Increments","memory":"14.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool canMakeSubsequence(string s, string t) {\nint n= s.size();\n        int m =t.size();\n        int i=0,j=0;\n        while(i<n&&j<m){\n            if(s[i]==t[j]||t[j]-s[i]==1||(s[i]=='z'&&t[j]=='a')){\n                i++;j++;\n                \n            }else i++;\n        }\n        return j==m?1:0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-string-a-subsequence-using-cyclic-increments","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
